title: The spread of Mini-Publics across the World
description: As a part of the project “Doing mini-publics: Translocalization of politics” and as a test, the aim was a complete survey of deliberative mini-publics worldwide. The umbrella term mini-publics describes a series of procedures that directly involves citizens and promote democratic deliberation. Since the 1970s, different models have spread around the world, initially independently of one another.
